newsitem.title: USA: Regal Hotels, Winn acquire Bostonian.
newsitem.headline: Regal Hotels, Winn acquire Bostonian.

text.p: Regal Hotels International Holdings Ltd of Hong Kong and Winn Development Co of Boston said they acquired the Bostonian Hotel for an undisclosed price.
The 152-room hotel will be managed by Richfield Hospitality Services Inc, the United States-based subsidiary of Regal Hotels, the companies said.
The hotel, located across from Boston's Faneuil Hall Marketplace, will be renamed the Regal Bostonian Hotel.
The companies said they will seek additional hotel acquisition and investment opportunities in cities such as New York City, San Francisco, Washington, D.C., Miami and Atlanta for growth.
